The claim was accompanied by a photograp: identified as 47-year-old Moinuddin from Kerala, living in Delhi as a JNU student.
The text on the photograph mentioned tha: claiming that there was a riot inside the campus and parents and guardians were not allowed to visit. The man responded by stating that he is a JNU student.
Alt News: an organization specializing in fact-checking, received multiple verification requests regarding the claim on its official mobile application.
The man in the photograph was identified: professor Kancha Ilaiah, from Telangana. He confirmed that the viral photograph is his and clarified that he never studied in JNU. He also mentioned his intention to file a complaint against the post.
